IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.alternativeInitiative.H: Use alternative initiative from the formula below. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.computeDoublesAll.Name: (House Rule) Add Critical/Fumble on all tests
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.computeDoublesAll.Hint: Not all tests add Critical/Fumble on tests. This will add a tag below the result. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.changeConditionImages.H: Will change (upon restart) the default condition images. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.changeConditionImagesPa: Change to your folder of images (need to be webp). None S3 bucket, only data. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.alternativeMasterCrafte: Reduces the amount of Armour Master Crafted quality gives to Armour from +2 to +1, except for Power armour. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.alternativeRend.Name: (House Rule) Boosted Rend
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.alternativeRend.Hint: The Rend trait gains Penetrating equal to 1/2 of Rend, rounded down. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.tokenRuler.Name: Token Movement Measurement
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.tokenRuler.Hint: When you drag a token, the ruler will change color based on speed. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.activeSuperiority.Name: (House Rule) Active Superiority
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.activeSuperiority.Hint: Split Superiority between Allied and Enemy, use a different version of rules. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.shootingIntoMelee.Name: (Optional) Shooting Into Melee
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.shootingIntoMelee.Hint: Adds Shooting into Melee option to the attacker dialog. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.autoCritKillNpcs.name: Automatically add crits to NPCs
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.autoCritKillNpcs.hint: Additionally it kills NPCs that are over max critical wounds. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.showNpcCrit.name: Show NPC Critical wounds in chat
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.showNpcCrit.hint: Usable with automatically added crits to NPCs. If checked the critical wounds from attacks will be posted to chat and added to the npc. Otherwise, it will silently add it to the npc. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.deleteIniMessage.name: Delete Initiative rolls in chat
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.deleteIniMessage.hint: Best used when alternative Initiative is not used. Requires restart.
IMPMAL_COMMUNITY.ShootingMelee.Name: Shooting Into Melee
